forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 71F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
